attributes.action: Reform SENCO and every teacher should have special needs training in schools.
attributes.background:
SENCO and teacher traing require more to be done. There is not enough been done regarding special needs and teachers understanding certain disabillities more i.e:
TSC
Aspergers
Autism
Dyspraxia and dyslexia,and mental health issues as a whole.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by "reform SENCO". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
